question:
Who of the following were the member of the Cabinet Mission
1. Sir Stafford Cripps
2. A. V. Alexander
3. Pethick-Lawrence
4. Lord Wavell
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Cabinet Mission came to India in the year 1946. The members of the Cabinet Mission are Sir Stafford Cripps (President of the Board of Trade), A. V. Alexander (First Lord of the Admiralty), Pethick-Lawrence (The Secretary of State for India).
